title: Imac 27 compatible
message: What parts are compatible in imac 27 2010 and 2011?

title: Imac 27 compatible
message: Can I interchange GFX card, power supply and screens?

title: Imac 27 compatible
message: PSU will all work. GFX cards depends on model. Screens have different connectors.

title: Imac 27 compatible
message: GFX with heatsink will be ok for all models?

title: Imac 27 compatible
message: No. It will work but an unsupported card will not have any thermal control. If you swap a card that is not native to the machine you will need to stick the ODD thermal sensor to the back of the GFX heat sink or the card will over heat.
